meanings.definition: A person who practices magic; a sorcerer or magician.
meanings.sent1: The wizards in the story could cast spells and make things disappear.
meanings.sent2: The children were amazed by the wizards' ability to perform magic tricks.
meanings.sent3: The wizards at the birthday party made the cake disappear with a wave of their wands!
meanings.sent4: The wizards' ability to make the impossible possible was truly enchanting.
meanings.sent5: The image of the wizards' mystical powers stayed with the audience long after the show ended.

meanings.definition: A skilled or clever person in a particular field.
meanings.sent1: The computer wizards at the tech company could solve any problem with ease.
meanings.sent2: She was known as the marketing wizard for her ability to come up with creative campaigns.
meanings.sent3: The baking wizard in the kitchen could turn simple ingredients into delicious treats.
meanings.sent4: His skills as a negotiation wizard helped him close deals successfully.
meanings.sent5: The gardening wizard transformed the backyard into a beautiful oasis with colorful flowers and plants.
